full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,BYANG CHUB LAM RIM GYIS BRGYUD 'DEBS LAM MCHOG SGO 'BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016B (BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I BRGYUD PA RNAMS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I RIM PA @017A *, ,LAM MCHOG SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI 'DONG 'DUN CAN DU MAS BSKUL BA'I DON DU, SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DU MAS BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA'I GRUB GNAS BYANG RVA SGRENG RGYAL BA'I DBEN GNAS KYI DGON PA GONG DU DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA'I SKU DNGOS DANG KHYAD PAR MA MCHIS PA'I SKU 'DRA DBU YON MA CHE BAR GRAGS PA'I SPYAN SNGAR YUN RING DU GSOL BA BTAB NAS SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SH'AKYA BZANG GIS BGYIS PA'O, ,DAD LDAN DPON SLOB 'KHOR DANG BCAS RNAMS KYIS, ,PHA MAS THOG DRANGS MA RGAN 'GRO BA KUN, ,MYUR DU BLA MED BYAD CHEN THOB PHIR DU, ,BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG GNAS GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS, ,)
